short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: internet-as-a-gallery is an artistic exploration of defamiliarizing the www through reimagning the web page as a gallery space

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The project reimagines the web page as a gallery space prompting to reflect on the role of alt text in fostering a more inclusive and diverse online experience.
